page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: John Gibbard School, Sharnbrook, would like to thank the following people for their help with the Domesday Project...... The Allman, Earl, Frost, Hall, Hammersley, Haydon, Hillard, Holland, McCormick, Odell, and O'Meara families....... Odell Leather Industries, Unilever Research...... P.Cuthbertson, R.Duhy, Wendy Duhy, J.Hardgrave, Rev.Canon H.Jones, Mrs.A.Kindleysides, Mrs.M.Lapworth, D.Linger, A.Read, Mrs.L.Stander, R.Wiltshire....... The children in 1985's Class 5, specially Claire Gibbons, Amaryllis Holland and Richard Hillard........ and all the people who answered our questions.
